alerts.areYouSureDelete: Are you sure that you want to delete this?
alerts.areYouSureMerge: Are you sure you want to merge these users? This cannot be undone.
alerts.departureAndArrivalOnDifferentDays: Are you sure you were sitting in '{X}' for several days?
alerts.fillOut: Please provide the following information so we can better match your statements.
alerts.futureNotAllowed: Date is not allowed to be in the future

noData.approve/travel: There are no travels to approve
noData.confirm/healthCareCost: There are no health care costs yet to be confirmed.
noData.confirm/healthCareCost/refunded: There are no confirmed health care costs
noData.examine/expenseReport: There are no expenses to examine.
noData.examine/healthCareCost: There are no health care costs to examine
noData.examine/healthCareCost/underExaminationB: There are no health care costs under examination by health insurances.
noData.examine/travel: There are no travels to examine
noData.expense: There are no expenses jet. Add one!
noData.expenseReport: You have not added an expense report yet. Create your first expense report!
noData.healthCareCost: You have not submitted any health care costs yet.
noData.stage: There are no stages jet. Add one!
noData.travel: There are no travels. Add one!

alerts.warningReapply: By reapplying, entries may get lost which then lie outside the reapplied time window.

description.keyFullIdentifier: The key is the complete identifier, e.g: {"labels.new": "NEW"}

info.advance: If you need an advance (e.g. for the plane tickets), specify here how much you need.
info.cateringNoRefund: If the meal is already paid by the employer (e.g. conference fee / breakfast in hotel) no meal allowance can be reimbursed. Please enter which meals are already paid by the employer.
info.claimOvernightLumpSum: You can either claim overnight lump sums or account for the actual cost of overnight accommodations.
info.claimSpouseRefund: If you are traveling with your spouse and he is also eligible for reimbursement, you can bill him as well.
info.destinationPlace: Specify here the place that is the destination of your trip.
info.fellowTravelersNames: Enter here all names of the persons traveling with you (e.g.: spouse, children)
info.insurance: Select your health insurance company, which will be asked to reimburse your health costs.
info.lastPlaceOfWork: Select your last place of work here, this is decisive for the lump sums of your departure.
info.loseAccessAt: Set a date here from which the user should no longer have access to @:{'headlines.title'}@:{'headlines.emoji'}
info.midnightCountries: Specify which country you were in at midnight, the food allowance depends on it.
info.patientName: Enter the name of the person for whom the costs were incurred.
info.professionalShare: A business trip may also have private components, but these may not account for 50% or more.
info.project: Select the project to be billed.
info.purpose: Specify which purpose this stage served.
info.reason: Briefly state the reason for your trip here.
info.special: Select a city here IF one from the selection applies. There are special lump sums for some cities.
info.travelInsideOfEU: Is your trip a cross-country trip within the EU?
info.vehicleRegistration: Upload the vehicle registration of your car here.

installation.header: Install the App with these steps:

one.two: Menu (in the middle of the bottom).
Menu (on the top, next to adress bar).
symbol (on the top, next to adress bar).

labels.sendPDFReportsToOrganisationEmail: Send PDF reports to organisation email
labels.allowSpouseRefund: Allow accounting for spouses when traveling
labels.allowTravelApplicationForThePast: Allow travel applications for the past
labels.deleteApprovedTravelAfterXDaysUnused: Delete approved, unused trips - in days
labels.deleteInWorkReportsAfterXDaysUnused: Delete unused expense and healthcare cost reports - in days
labels.deleteRefundedAfterXDays: Delete refunded reports and trips - in days
labels.delOverwritten: Should the overwritten user be deleted?
labels.factorCateringLumpSum: Factor for the catering lump sums
labels.factorCateringLumpSumExceptions: Exceptions to the factorization of the catering lump sums
labels.factorOvernightLumpSum: Factor for the overnight lump sums
labels.factorOvernightLumpSumExceptions: Exceptions to the factorization of the overnight lump sums
labels.fallBackLumpSumCountry: Fall back country for lump sums
labels.mailXDaysBeforeDeletion: Receive notification mail before deletion - in days
labels.maxTravelDayCount: Maximum length of a business trip [days]
labels.minHoursOfTravel: Minimum duration of a business trip [hours]
labels.minProfessionalShare: Minimum professional share of a business trip
labels.name: Name
labels.secondNightOnAirplaneLumpSumCountry: Country for the catering lump sums from the 2nd night in an aircraft
labels.secondNightOnShipOrFerryLumpSumCountry: Country for the catering lump sums from the 2nd night on a ship
labels.toleranceStageDatesToApprovedTravelDates: Deviation tolerance of the stages from the requested dates [days]
labels.underExaminationByInsuranceHealthCareCos: Health care costs under examination by health insurances
labels.vehicleRegistrationWhenUsingOwnCar: Vehicle registration if traveling with own car

backToInWork.paragraph: Your expense report has been sent back to you for revision.
backToInWork.subject: 🔙 Revise expense report

inWork.paragraph: A new expense report was created for you.
inWork.subject: 🆕 Expense Report

inWorkDeletedSoon.paragraph: Your created expense report '{reportName}' will be automatically deleted in {days} days due to inactivity.
inWorkDeletedSoon.subject: Automatic deletion soon

refundedDeletedSoon.paragraph: Your refunded expense report '{reportName}' will be automatically deleted in {days} days. You can download the report until then.
refundedDeletedSoon.subject: Automatic deletion soon

backToInWork.paragraph: Your health care costs have been sent back to you for revision.

inWork.paragraph: A new health care cost was created for you.

inWorkDeletedSoon.paragraph: Your created health care cost report '{reportName}' will be automatically deleted in {days} days due to inactivity.
inWorkDeletedSoon.subject: Automatic deletion soon

refunded.paragraph: Your health care costs got reimbursed in the amount of {refundSum} by the insurance.
refunded.subject: 💲 Health care costs refunded

refundedDeletedSoon.paragraph: Your refunded health care cost report '{reportName}' will be automatically deleted in {days} days. You can download the report until then.
refundedDeletedSoon.subject: Automatic deletion soon

rejected.paragraph: Your health care costs got rejected.
rejected.subject: ❌ Health care costs rejected

underExamination.paragraph: {owner} has submit his health care costs.
underExamination.subject: 🛂 Health care costs to examine

underExaminationByInsurance.paragraph: Your health care costs have been send to the insurance for a refund. In the meantime you will get the total amount paid to your account.
underExaminationByInsurance.subject: 🔜 Health care costs at insurance

newMagiclogin.lastParagraph:
To log in, all you need is your e-mail address.
Click on 'Sign in with E-Mail', enter your e-mail address and you will receive an e-mail with a link that will log you in directly when you click on it.
newMagiclogin.paragraph: Welcome to @:{'headlines.title'}@:{'headlines.emoji'}. Here you can submit all your expenses.
newMagiclogin.subject: Welcome to @:{'headlines.title'}@:{'headlines.emoji'}

reload.info: A new version of this app is avaiable. Please reload the page:

refundedDeletedSoon.paragraph: Your refunded travel '{reportName}' will be automatically deleted in {days} days. You can download the report until then.
